Subskills.name: Vigorous Leader
Subskills.description: Increases the life of randy the rancid rat.

Subskills.name: Enhanced Jaws
Subskills.description: Increases the damage of randy the rancid rat.

Subskills.name: Randy Rider
Subskills.description: Mount randy the rancid rat gaining increased movement speed, jumping power and the ability to jump through high terrain. Taking damage will unmount you. Randy the rancid rat now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Rat Invoker
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to unleash piercing plague rats towards the target.

Subskills.name: Speed Chomps
Subskills.description: Increases the movement speed and attack speed of randy the rancid rat.

Subskills.name: Expansive Plague Mind
Subskills.description: Randy the rancid rat gains an aura inflicting monsters with poisoned.

Subskills.name: Disease Hoarder
Subskills.description: Increases the poisoned inflicted by randy the rancid rat.

Subskills.name: Blood Transfusion
Subskills.description: Randy the rancid rat recovers a portion of its maximum life on hit.

Subskills.name: Gluttony
Subskills.description: Increases the attack area of effect radius of randy the rancid rat whenever striking a monster stacking infinitely. Decreases the duration of randy the rancid rat.

Subskills.name: Armored Fur
Subskills.description: Increases all resistances and damage reduction for randy the rancid rat.

Subskills.name: Rage Sequence
Subskills.description: Chance to become enraged on hit increasing damage dealt and attack speed.

Subskills.name: Vital Division
Subskills.description: Redirect a portion of incoming damage to randy the rancid rat.

Subskills.name: Dragorat
Subskills.description: Randy the rancid rat unleashes a breath of fire when attacking.

Subskills.name: QA3-Modified Specimen
Subskills.description: Randy the rancid rat summons additional tiny rats armed with blunderbusses dealing a portion of the damage on hit.
